result.execSummary:
The defendant Jesus Alexis Montes-Lopez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operate w/o Valid License(2nd w/in3 Yrs), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.05(3)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Bond previously posted in the amount of $200.00 has been applied.  The remaining balance of the Costs to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.
DNA sample to be provided and surcharge assessed.

charges.descr: Operate w/o Valid License(2nd w/in3 Yrs)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jesus Alexis Montes-Lopez

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Case Recalled at 3:37 PM: Defendant Jesus Alexis Montes-Lopez in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Enrique Soria present as Interpreter.  Oath administered at previous hearing today.  ADA did speak with Def on resolution and recites same.  Def confirms resolution.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and expertise.  Voluntary waiver of counsel accepted by Court.  Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed. Plea No DL 2:  GP  Court accepts plea and enters JOC.  Statement by Def:  None offered.  The Court:  Imposes Court Costs only - bond to be applied - 60 DTP Bal or PP.  DNA Sample to be provided today.  Expungement process explained to Defendant.  Hispanic Appeal Rights Given.
No operation of any motor vehicles without a valid driver's license.

Case Called @ 3:07 PM: Defendant Jesus Alexis Montes-Lopez in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Enrique Soria present as Interpreter.  Interpreter oath administered by the Court.    Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Advised of right of Counsel.  Def does not wish counsel and requests to speak with the State on resolution.  Off Record for Def to speak with the State.  Back of Record at 3:12 PM:  Per ADA - Def now requests counsel thru SPD.  Def is employed full time.  Court discusses earnings with Def.  Based upon earnings, Def referred to SPD for eligibility.   NGP entered by Court.   Court orders $200 cash bond w/conditions.  Def to speak with SPD following Court today.  P/S Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within the complaint.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 14, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

citations.chargeDescr: Operate w/o Valid License(2nd w/in3 Yrs)
